description: The Caryopteris clandonensis 'Longwood Blue' plant, also known as Bluebeard, is truly amazing. It has a unique, fragrant smell that attracts hummingbirds, and its attractive blue flowers are an eye-catching addition to the garden. It grows quickly and is an excellent choice for climates across the United States. Its foliage is a deep green, and it can reach heights of three to four feet - just Perfect for a privacy hedge. It is an easy-care drought and deer resistant shrub that is perfect for a casual, natural garden look. Its hardiness makes it a great companion to many other plants. There is no need to debate, Bluebeard is truly an amazing plant.
